result.markdown: --- title: "Week 5: Exponential smoothing" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Simple exponential smoothing * Corresponding ETS models ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-5, 8, 11-12 from [Section 5.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox-exercises.html). ## Exercise solutions ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 8.1-8.4 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Assignments * [IA2](../assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Monday 07 April. * [GA2](../assignments/G2.qmd) is due on Monday 14 April.
